back with his hand."},{"lineNumber":25785,"originalJapaneseLine":"従者がそれに反応し、次の戦斧を手に押し込んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"His follower responded and shoved another battle axe into his hand."},{"lineNumber":25786,"originalJapaneseLine":"既に、使い潰された戦斧は三本目だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was already the third battle axe he had worn heat."},{"lineNumber":25790,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぁっ、はぁっ、ひぃっ、ひいいっ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah, hah, hii, hii...!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま力任せに頭を叩き割る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He smashed his head with brute force.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐ、ぐふぉっ……に、人間かこいつ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guh, gufoh... Is this guy... human...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あがががが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A-agagagaga..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここは通行止めだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is a blockade!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっとと引き返すんだな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Turn back quickly!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コルドバが正面の門に飛び込んでから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After Cordoba rushed into the front gate,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いは膠着状態になった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the battle reached a stalemate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 個人としての戦闘能力もさることながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aside from his individual combat skills,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巧みで粘り強い指揮と決して屈しない姿が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: his skillful, persistent command and unyielding attitude

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士達の戦意を支え続ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: continued to sustain the soldiers' fighting spirit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲の壁を登る部隊も懸命な妨害で再三阻まれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Units climbing the surrounding walls were repeatedly blocked by determined interference,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砦の中への侵入は、中々果たせそうになかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and infiltration into the fortress seemed almost impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、何を…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, what are you...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ずいぶんと攻めあぐねているな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're struggling quite a bit with the assault.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなものか、お前の部隊は」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is this all your unit is capable of?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （くっ……切り札を使いたくはなかったが……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Damn... I didn’t want to use my trump card...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、魔素漢を出せ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Enough! Deploy the magic element troops!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おおぉぉっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-ohhh!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突如として閃光が奔り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, a flash of light streaked,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コルドバと周囲の兵士達に炸裂した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: exploding around Cordoba and the surrounding soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「隊長！　魔素漢です！　数、約一千！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Captain! The magic element troops! Around a thousand!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後方から、魔法攻撃がっ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the rear, magical attacks...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔法使いか……やばいな、ッ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mages...? This is bad...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法の一斉射は強力で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The magical barrage was powerful,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲のものを薙ぎ払いながら破壊する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sweeping through and destroying everything around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一撃で絶命させるほどの威力ではなくとも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though not powerful enough to kill in a single strike,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが千名もの人数で放たれれば、脅威そのものだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: being unleashed by a thousand troops is a threat in itself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「弓兵隊！　高所から、なんとか奴らを狙って……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Archers! From the high ground, try to target them somehow..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っ、おおおおおぉぉぉ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, ooooohhhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時、青の軍の兵たちを振り切って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, breaking through the Blue Army soldiers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人の魔物兵が門の前まで飛び込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a single monster soldier flew up to the gate.
"What――――"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵は、ぷちハニー爆弾を大量に抱えていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster soldier was carrying a large number of Puchi Hanny Bombs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その威力は凄まじく、周辺の兵士と門とを、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their power was tremendous, blowing away nearby soldiers and the gate,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 持ち主ごと吹き飛ばしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: blasting them along with their owner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっそ！　やりやがったあいつ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn it! That bastard did it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 抜け駆けじゃねーか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He went rogue!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自爆かよ！　いいなぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He self-destructed! So cool..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、とりあえず……突撃だぁ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, for now... charge!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜の闇を、無数の白刃が閃き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the darkness of night, countless blades gleamed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死体の山を築き上げていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: building piles of corpses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「門を守れ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Defend the gate!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが叫び、砦の残存兵力が次々に投入された。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone shouted, and the fortress’s remaining troops were deployed one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 効率とか予備戦力とか、言える状況ではなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It wasn’t a situation to talk about efficiency or reserve forces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふ、ぬ、おおおおおおおおおおお！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh, nu, oooooooooh!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 投げつけられる斧を自らの斧で弾き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He deflected thrown axes with his own axe,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弓は肩のアーマーで弾く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and blocked arrows with the armor on his shoulder.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつの間にか、コルドバは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before he knew it, Cordoba

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 半ば残骸となった門の下で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was standing under the half-ruined gate,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仁王立ちになって斧を振るっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: standing firm and swinging his axe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 十何体目かの魔物兵の頭を、戦斧で叩き割る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He smashed the head of the tenth or so monster soldier with his battle axe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その瞬間、びきりと手元から音がした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, a cracking sound came from his hands.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「寄越せ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hand it over!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後ろに向かって手を伸ばす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He reached back with his hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 従者がそれに反応し、次の戦斧を手に押し込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His follower responded and shoved another battle axe into his hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に、使い潰された戦斧は三本目だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was already the third battle axe he had worn out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （リックの、真似は……ちょいときついな……！）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Imitating Rick is... a bit tough...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身体のあちこちには、決して浅くない傷がある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There were not shallow wounds all over his body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動きを止めれば、じくじくと熱を持って痛み出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If he stopped moving, the pains would throb with heat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぁっ、はぁっ、ひぃっ、ひいいっ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah, hah, hii, hii...!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

hands."},{"lineNumber":25783,"originalJapaneseLine":"「寄越せ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hand it over!\""},{"lineNumber":25784,"originalJapaneseLine":"後ろに向かって手を伸ばす。","translatedEnglishLine":"He reached back with his hand."},{"lineNumber":25785,"originalJapaneseLine":"従者がそれに反応し、次の戦斧を手に押し込んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"His follower responded and shoved another battle axe into his hand."},{"lineNumber":25786,"originalJapaneseLine":"既に、使い潰された戦斧は三本目だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was already the third battle axe he had worn out."},{"lineNumber":25787,"originalJapaneseLine":"（リックの、真似は……ちょいときついな……！）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Imitating Rick is... a bit tough...!)"},{"lineNumber":25788,"originalJapaneseLine":"身体のあちこちには、決して浅くない傷がある。","translatedEnglishLine":"There were not shallow wounds all over his body."},{"lineNumber":25789,"originalJapaneseLine":"動きを止めれば、じくじくと熱を持って痛み出す。","translatedEnglishLine":"If he stopped moving, the pains would throb with heat."},{"lineNumber":25790,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぁっ、はぁっ、ひぃっ、ひいいっ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah, hah, hii, hii...!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま力任せに頭を叩き割る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He smashed his head with brute force.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐ、ぐふぉっ……に、人間かこいつ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guh, gufoh... Is this guy... human...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あがががが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A-agagagaga..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここは通行止めだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is a blockade!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっとと引き返すんだな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Turn back quickly!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コルドバが正面の門に飛び込んでから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After Cordoba rushed into the front gate,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いは膠着状態になった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the battle reached a stalemate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 個人としての戦闘能力もさることながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aside from his individual combat skills,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巧みで粘り強い指揮と決して屈しない姿が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: his skillful, persistent command and unyielding attitude

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士達の戦意を支え続ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: continued to sustain the soldiers' fighting spirit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲の壁を登る部隊も懸命な妨害で再三阻まれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Units climbing the surrounding walls were repeatedly blocked by determined interference,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砦の中への侵入は、中々果たせそうになかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and infiltration into the fortress seemed almost impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、何を…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, what are you...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ずいぶんと攻めあぐねているな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're struggling quite a bit with the assault.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなものか、お前の部隊は」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is this all your unit is capable of?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （くっ……切り札を使いたくはなかったが……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Damn... I didn’t want to use my trump card...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、魔素漢を出せ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Enough! Deploy the magic element troops!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おおぉぉっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-ohhh!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突如として閃光が奔り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, a flash of light streaked,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コルドバと周囲の兵士達に炸裂した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: exploding around Cordoba and the surrounding soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「隊長！　魔素漢です！　数、約一千！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Captain! The magic element troops! Around a thousand!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後方から、魔法攻撃がっ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the rear, magical attacks...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔法使いか……やばいな、ッ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mages...? This is bad...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法の一斉射は強力で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The magical barrage was powerful,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲のものを薙ぎ払いながら破壊する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sweeping through and destroying everything around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一撃で絶命させるほどの威力ではなくとも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though not powerful enough to kill in a single strike,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが千名もの人数で放たれれば、脅威そのものだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: being unleashed by a thousand troops is a threat in itself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「弓兵隊！　高所から、なんとか奴らを狙って……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Archers! From the high ground, try to target them somehow..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っ、おおおおおぉぉぉ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, ooooohhhh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時、青の軍の兵たちを振り切って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, breaking through the Blue Army soldiers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人の魔物兵が門の前まで飛び込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a single monster soldier flew up to the gate.
"What――――"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵は、ぷちハニー爆弾を大量に抱えていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster soldier was carrying a large number of Puchi Hanny Bombs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その威力は凄まじく、周辺の兵士と門とを、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Their power was tremendous, blowing away nearby soldiers and the gate,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 持ち主ごと吹き飛ばしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: blasting them along with their owner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっそ！　やりやがったあいつ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn it! That bastard did it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 抜け駆けじゃねーか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He went rogue!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自爆かよ！　いいなぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He self-destructed! So cool..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、とりあえず……突撃だぁ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, for now... charge!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜の闇を、無数の白刃が閃き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the darkness of night, countless blades gleamed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死体の山を築き上げていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: building piles of corpses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「門を守れ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Defend the gate!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが叫び、砦の残存兵力が次々に投入された。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone shouted, and the fortress’s remaining troops were deployed one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 効率とか予備戦力とか、言える状況ではなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It wasn’t a situation to talk about efficiency or reserve forces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふ、ぬ、おおおおおおおおおおお！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh, nu, oooooooooh!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 投げつけられる斧を自らの斧で弾き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He deflected thrown axes with his own axe,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弓は肩のアーマーで弾く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and blocked arrows with the armor on his shoulder.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつの間にか、コルドバは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before he knew it, Cordoba

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 半ば残骸となった門の下で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was standing under the half-ruined gate,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仁王立ちになって斧を振るっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: standing firm and swinging his axe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 十何体目かの魔物兵の頭を、戦斧で叩き割る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He smashed the head of the tenth or so monster soldier with his battle axe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その瞬間、びきりと手元から音がした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, a cracking sound came from his hands.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「寄越せ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hand it over!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後ろに向かって手を伸ばす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He reached back with his hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 従者がそれに反応し、次の戦斧を手に押し込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His follower responded and shoved another battle axe into his hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に、使い潰された戦斧は三本目だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was already the third battle axe he had worn out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （リックの、真似は……ちょいときついな……！）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Imitating Rick is... a bit tough...!)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身体のあちこちには、決して浅くない傷がある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There were not shallow wounds all over his body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動きを止めれば、じくじくと熱を持って痛み出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If he stopped moving, the pains would throb with heat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぁっ、はぁっ、ひぃっ、ひいいっ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah, hah, hii, hii...!"
